YELLOW TEA is a rare and expensive variety of tea. It is produced similarly to Green Tea, but with an added step of being steamed under a damp cloth after oxidation. giving the leaves a slightly yellow colouring. This process also imparts a mellower and less grassy taste than is found in green teas.
